description.zh: Mautic 是世界上最大的开源营销自动化项目，为企业和组织提供强大、注重隐私且可高度定制的软件，以运行全面集成的营销活动。该项目由全球开发者社区共同支持。
description.en: Mautic is the world’s largest open source marketing automation project. It empowers businesses and organizations to run fully integrated marketing campaigns using powerful, privacy-focused, and customizable software. The project is supported by a global community of contributors.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 开源免费，无任何附加条件
- 不依赖第三方 SaaS，可自主运行营销自动化
- 使用自有数据库，完全掌控数据
- 无供应商锁定，可随时切换或修改系统
- 可创建所需的任意集成
- 无功能限制，构建更强大的营销活动
- 前端与后端均可 100% 定制
- 多渠道营销无需额外成本
- 无限细分与自动化功能

## 功能列表:

- 开源营销自动化平台
- 强大且世界级的营销工具
- 注重隐私的设计
- 前端与后端均可完全定制
- 多渠道活动管理
- 高级细分与自动化能力
- 支持自托管，数据完全自主控制
- 活跃的全球开发者社区
- 广泛的集成可能性
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- It's open source - use it for free, no strings attached
- Don't rely on third-party SaaS, run your own marketing automation
- Use your own database and own your data
- No vendor lock-in - switch or modify at will
- Create any integration you need
- Build stronger campaigns, without feature limitations
- Both frontend and backend are 100% customizable
- Multi-channel marketing without extra costs
- Unlimited segmentation and automation

## Features:

- Open source marketing automation platform
- Powerful and world-class marketing tools
- Privacy-focused design
- Fully customizable frontend and backend
- Multi-channel campaign management
- Advanced segmentation and automation capabilities
- Self-hosting option with full data control
- Active global contributor community
- Extensive integration possibilities
